concept.title: LAYCUR Command
concept.shortdesc: Moves selected entities to the current layer.

conbody.p: Move selected entities to the current layer without having to specify the name of the current layer.

p.b: Select entities to be moved to the current layer

conbody.p: Select one or more entities you want to move to the current layer. You can continue selecting entities until you press Enter to end the command. The Command line indicates how many entities were moved and to what layer:

p.b: # entities were moved to the current layer ("LayerName1").
